## Code Book for Course Project



This describes the variables in the CleanData_Project2.txt file:

- column 1: subject_id. this is the id number of the subject under test
- column 2: test_id. this is the actual test that was performed, with 6 possible: WALKING, WALKING_UPSTAIRS, WALKING_DOWNSTAIRS, SITTING, STANDING, LAYING
- columns 3-48: these are the mean values for the given variable for each subject and each test. "f" indicates frequency and "t" indicates time.
